title: Miami coach discusses matchup against Ohio U
text:
Miami coach discusses matchup against Ohio U 
Updated: Mon, Oct 05 2015, 02:10 PM 
OXFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- Miami football coach Chuck Martin discusses the loss at Kent State and previews this Saturday's game against Ohio U in the video. The teams will meet at 2:00 p.m. in Athens. Miami has dropped four straight games. Image and video courtesy Miami University Athletics Related Stories Entertainment News

WASHINGTON (AP) -- Growth in the U.S. services sector slowed in September as sales fell and new orders plunged, evidence that stock market volatility may have hit consumer confidence and limited spending.
